<img align="center" src="http://s1.directupload.net/images/110424/he54f4fc.png">
<br>
SportsDevil is a video addon for live sports and highlights, blogs and
TV. It's based on VideoDevil, so big thanks to the developers. <br>
Please try it out and give me some feedback. <br>
<br>
<a href="http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?15ora2jm9cro7nj"><font size="4">Download</font></a>
or install via <a href="http://repository-xbmcnerds.googlecode.com/files/repository.xbmcnerds.zip">repo</a><br>
<br>
<br>
[http://www.pic-upload.de/view-11304290/livetv.ru.menu.jpg.html http://www7.pic-upload.de/06.09.11/lmo7inv6x5es.jpg]<br>
<br>
[http://www.pic-upload.de/view-11304324/livetv.ru.highlights.jpg.html http://www7.pic-upload.de/06.09.11/okrptesovi7.jpg]<br>

Changelog:<br>
<br>
V1.6.5:
<ul>
  <li> much of the code rewritten and cleaned</li>
  <li> added streamers: JustinTV</li>
  <li> fixed some streamers: CastAmp, SeeOn, ...</li>
  <li> improved detection of redirects</li>
  <li> improved de-mystification of html source code</li>
  <li> new context menu item 'Queue': adds both folders and
videos to the current video playlist (folders are scanned for videos
first). Please don't use the queue key on your remote (if configured)
or 'q', if 'autoplay' is enabled. You can always use the context menu
item. <br>
This new option allows you to:
    <ul>
      <li> make a simulcast of several matches</li>
      <li> easily change to another stream if the current one is
overloaded</li>
      <li> create a playlist of tv channels and save it for later
usage</li>
    </ul>
A known bug of this new feature is, that the current playlist is
cleared by xbmc whenever an error occurs while trying to play a certain
stream. I don't know why it doesn't just skip this item like it does
with offline streams.</li>
  <li> new context menu option 'Download'</li>
  <li> new sites:
    <ul>
      <li>TV
        <ul>
          <li> LiveSportsOnWeb</li>
          <li> Twww.TV</li>
          <li> PutPat.tv</li>
          <li> ShadowNet.ro</li>
          <li> MyPremium.tv</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
    <ul>
      <li>Live Sports
        <ul>
          <li> SoccerHD.info</li>
          <li> RojaDirecta.me</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </li>
  <li> language is now detected automatically</li>
  <li> player is set to auto by default<br>
  </li>
</ul>
<br>
V1.6.4:
<ul>
  <li> added streamers: Rey, 24in, Hogy, Laola1 (livestreams),
LiveBox, MegaLive, Streami, TuTele, VipLive, Rede.tv, Myp2p.in, ASF,
M3U8, ProTV, Nacevi, Guarapa, Globo + several direct RTMPs</li>
  <li> fixed streamers here and there</li>
  <li> added many hardcoded redirects + some intelligence to
detect redirects automatically (working pretty good)</li>
  <li> single folders are selected automatically on certain pages</li>
  <li> added setting: autoplay (play single video in a list
automatically)</li>
  <li> added setting: timeoffset (auto correct times,
experimental)</li>
  <li> autoselection and autoplay should bring you straight to
the embedded video and play it</li>
  <li> added site: lshunter.tv (thanks to GeorgeStroke for the
nice logo)</li>
  <li> fixed site: chanfeed.com</li>
  <li> new section 'TV'</li>
  <li> the addon now caches the current html source code
=&gt; faster navigation, less traffic</li>
  <li> a lot of refactoring (hope it wasn't too much)</li>
  <li> many fixes</li>
</ul>
<br>
V1.6.3:
<ul>

V1.6.0:
<ul>
  <li> fixed: zonein, limev, seeon</li>
  <li> added: streambig, mips, liveview365, svtplay, strmr</li>
  <li> sport1.de: fixed regular expressions (site changed)</li>
  <li> goalsarena.org: fixed links in categories</li>
  <li> autoplay disabled for 2 reasons: 1. sometimes, if another
plugin is called, I get an error "called from invalid handle", 2. you
can see which streamer is used and can therefore give better feedback
about working status</li>

</ul>

<ul>

V1.4.0:
<ul>
  <li> livetv.ru - highlights: fixed links</li>
  <li> far less clicks needed to resolve the stream url</li>
  <li> myp2p.eu: categories now dynamically created</li>
  <li> lots of changes to physical folder and file structure</li>
  <li> Added: Yandex</li>
  <li> Sports Icons (thanx to Hudson_Hawk04)</li>
  <li> ...</li>
  <li> Syntax:
    <ul>
      <li> new: 'section' (only parse a part of the page)</li>
      <li> new methods for 'item_info_convert':
replaceFromDict(dictfile), getInfo(page,regex)</li>
      <li> new: call cfg with more than one parameter</li>
      <li> new: @CATCH(zonein,channel)@ defines a catcher per
stream</li>
      <li> ...</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>
<br>
V1.3.0:
<ul>
  <li> livetv.ru - live: categories now dynamically created</li>
  <li> livetv.ru - highlights: new folder structure</li>
  <li> livetv.ru - highlights: browse competitions</li>
  <li> some small fixes for youtube and yatv.ru</li>
  <li> Added: VKontakte, Sapo</li>
  <li> Syntax:
    <ul>
      <li> new: 'section' (only parse a part of the page)</li>
      <li> new: 'item_info_convert'
(methods:convDate(oldFormat,newFormat), timediff(dateStr)</li>
      <li> new: call cfg with parameter (cfg=file.cfg@Hello)
=&gt; (@PARAM1@ is replaced by 'Hello' in file.cfg)</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>
